overview: Fleeing from her husband, Ramona arrives at her son’s house in the city, where he lives with a group of friends amidst parties, alcohol, and marijuana. Embraced by the group, Ramona begins to let loose, freeing herself from the shyness imposed by the permanent gag she has been living with. This bold short film focuses on close-ups, the ties that bind, and prejudices.
title: Worlds Burning Amid the Shadows
